languages.text: {n}Агенты Экклезиархии, которой напомнили, что не они пока являются властью на Даргонусе, присмирели. Не бряцая более оружием, они попытались завоевать доверие схизматиков обещаниями трудовых послаблений для тех, кто оставит малый культ и отречется от схизматического учения.{/n}

{n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded who truly rules Dargonus, have grown quiet. They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Агенты Экклезиархии, которой напомнили, что не они пока являются властью на Даргонусе, присмирели. Не бряцая более оружием, они попытались завоевать доверие схизматиков обещаниями трудовых послаблений для тех, кто оставит малый культ и отречется от схизматического учения.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded that they were not yet in power, calmed down. They have tried to win the schismatics' trust without any sabre-rattling, by promising the labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cult and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

{n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded that they were not yet in power, calmed down. They have tried to win the schismatics' trust without any sabre-rattling, by promising the labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cult and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

{n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded who truly rules Dargonus, have grown quiet. They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling, by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling, by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

{n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded who truly rules Dargonus, have grown quiet. They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

languages.text: {n}国教的代理人意识到了谁才是达戈努斯真正的统治者。他们不再惹是生非，而是采取武力之外的手段，努力赢得异教徒的信任。对于那些愿意放弃小型教派与异端教义的人，他们承诺减轻那些人的劳役。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded who truly rules Dargonus, have grown quiet. They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}国教的代理人意识到了谁才是达戈努斯真正的统治者。他们不再惹是生非，而是采取武力之外的手段，努力赢得异教徒的信任。对于那些愿意放弃小型教派与异端教义的人，他们承诺减轻那些人的劳役。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los agentes de la Eclesiarquía, tras recordar quién gobierna realmente Dargonus, se han callado. En su lugar, han intentado ganarse la confianza de los cismáticos sin más protesta, prometiendo concesiones laborales a quienes abandonen los cultos menores y renuncien a las enseñanzas cismáticas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded who truly rules Dargonus, have grown quiet. They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los agentes de la Eclesiarquía, tras recordar quién gobierna realmente Dargonus, se han callado. En su lugar, han intentado ganarse la confianza de los cismáticos sin más protesta, prometiendo concesiones laborales a quienes abandonen los cultos menores y renuncien a las enseñanzas cismáticas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ダルゴナスの真の支配者が誰なのかを思い知らされた帝国聖教会の諜報員たちは、大人しくなった。その代わり、魔女団の少数派を捨て、分裂の教えを放棄する者たちに労働で譲歩すると約束することで、これ以上の妨害行為を止めて分派の信頼を勝ち取ろうとした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded who truly rules Dargonus, have grown quiet. They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ダルゴナスの真の支配者が誰なのかを思い知らされた帝国聖教会の諜報員たちは、大人しくなった。その代わり、魔女団の少数派を捨て、分裂の教えを放棄する者たちに労働で譲歩すると約束することで、これ以上の妨害行為を止めて分派の信頼を勝ち取ろうとした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les agents de l'Ecclésiarchie, se rappelant désormais qui dirige réellement Dargonus, finissent par se calmer. En revanche, ils tentent de gagner discrètement la confiance des schismatiques, promettant des concessions en termes de travail à ceux qui abandonnent les cultes mineurs et renoncent aux enseignements schismatiques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded who truly rules Dargonus, have grown quiet. They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les agents de l'Ecclésiarchie, se rappelant désormais qui dirige réellement Dargonus, finissent par se calmer. En revanche, ils tentent de gagner discrètement la confiance des schismatiques, promettant des concessions en termes de travail à ceux qui abandonnent les cultes mineurs et renoncent aux enseignements schismatiques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Agenten der Ekklesiarchie wurden daran erinnert, wer wirklich über Dargonus herrscht, und sind seitdem sehr still geworden. Sie versuchen stattdessen, ohne weiteres Säbelrassen das Vertrauen der Abtrünnigen zu gewinnen. Zu diesem Zweck haben sie allen, die den kleineren Kulten und deren spalterischen Lehren abschwören, bessere Arbeitsbedingungen versprochen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded who truly rules Dargonus, have grown quiet. They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Agenten der Ekklesiarchie wurden daran erinnert, wer wirklich über Dargonus herrscht, und sind seitdem sehr still geworden. Sie versuchen stattdessen, ohne weiteres Säbelrassen das Vertrauen der Abtrünnigen zu gewinnen. Zu diesem Zweck haben sie allen, die den kleineren Kulten und deren spalterischen Lehren abschwören, bessere Arbeitsbedingungen versprochen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dargonus'a gerçekten kimin hükmettiği hatırlatılan Ekleşiarşi ajanları, sükûnete büründüler. Bunun karşılığında daha fazla askerî güç gösterisi yapmadan bölücülerin güvenini kazanmaya çalıştılar ve ufak çaplı tarikatlarını terk edip bölücü öğretileri reddedenlere iş imtiyazı tanınacağına söz verdiler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The agents of the Ecclesiarchy, having been reminded who truly rules Dargonus, have grown quiet. They have instead tried to win the schismatics' trust without further sabre-rattling by promising labour concessions for those who would abandon the minor cults and renounce the schismatic teachings.{/n}
